header.gameNote: TOP OF THE WORLD CLASSIC AT FAIRBANKS AK

article.headline: Lamar 92, Montana State 82
article.story: FAIRBANKS, Alaska (AP) -- Alan Daniels scored 34 points, including 21 in the second half, and Lamar defeated Montana State 92-82 Sunday for seventh place in the BP Top of the World Classic. The Cardinals (1-2) fell behind early and trailed 43-40 at halftime but prevailed with defensive pressure and 17 points off free throws. The teams traded leads eight times in the second half until Daniels started a 9-0 run with a 3-pointer from the right wing with 6:03 remaining, giving Lamar the lead for good, 72-70. Daniels followed with a short jumper and after Matthew Barrow scored, Daniels stole the Bobcats' inbound pass and converted a layup to give Lamar a 78-70 lead with 4:44 remaining. Lamar hit 17-of-20 free throws in the final 20 minutes. The Cardinals forced 22 turnovers and had seven steals, including five in the second half. Barrow finished with 19 points. Thomas Fairly scored 18 and grabbed 11 rebounds for Lamar, which had 20 second-chance points on 19 offensive rebounds. Montana State (0-3) had six players in double figures. Nick Dissly led with 19 points and 10 rebounds. Al Beye had 15 points and 10 rebounds.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
